Title: Requires the office of children and family services to post additional relevant qualifications of child day care providers on the office website
Summary: Requires the office of children and family services to post any additional relevant qualifications of child day care providers which are submitted to such office on its website.
LawCode: Amd ยง390-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to posting child day care provider qualifications on the office of children and family services' website
